metadata.title: CVE-2020-0549 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cleanup errors in some data cache evictions for some Intel(R) Processorsmay allow an authenticated user to potentially enable informationdisclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-0549` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20200609.0ubuntu0.18.04.0
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20200609.0ubuntu0.18.04.0').
